text: @tedcruz Seems social media posts by former antiterrorism consultant Ron Hale in Feb about @Harvard Professor & Chinese nationals arrested with ties to Wuhan labs have proven to be scary true!If the information is top secret how did he connect the dots @POTUS #COVID19
